issue.message: READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is deprecated (and is not granted) when targeting Android 13+. If you need to query or interact with MediaStore or media files on the shared storage, you should instead use one or more new storage permissions: `READ_MEDIA_IMAGES`, `READ_MEDIA_VIDEO` or `READ_MEDIA_AUDIO`.
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is deprecated (and is not granted) when targeting Android 13+. If you need to write to shared storage, use the `MediaStore.createWriteRequest` intent.
The resource `R.integer.react_native_dev_server_port` appears to be unused
The resource `R.integer.react_native_inspector_proxy_port` appears to be unused
The resource `R.drawable.splashscreen_image` appears to be unused
The resource `R.string.expo_splash_screen_resize_mode` appears to be unused
The resource `R.string.expo_splash_screen_status_bar_translucent` appears to be unused
Launcher icons should not fill every pixel of their square region; see the design guide for details
Launcher icons should not fill every pixel of their square region; see the design guide for details
Launcher icon used as round icon did not have a circular shape
Launcher icons should not fill every pixel of their square region; see the design guide for details
Launcher icons should not fill every pixel of their square region; see the design guide for details

The image `splashscreen_image.png` varies significantly in its density-independent (dip) size across the various density versions: drawable-hdpi/splashscreen_image.png: 856x1852 dp (1284x2778 px), drawable-mdpi/splashscreen_image.png: 1284x2778 dp (1284x2778 px), drawable-xhdpi/splashscreen_image.png: 642x1389 dp (1284x2778 px), drawable-xxhdpi/splashscreen_image.png: 428x926 dp (1284x2778 px), drawable-xxxhdpi/splashscreen_image.png: 321x695 dp (1284x2778 px)
The `splashscreen_image.png` icon has identical contents in the following configuration folders: drawable-hdpi, drawable-mdpi, drawable-xhdpi, drawable-xxhdpi, drawable-xxxhdpi
